_header: Daily in England marvels be found
Subjects: women, against; carols, of marriage; marriage, carols of
_description: On the Tyranny of Women — nine stanzas rhyme royal and burden: ‘Nova noua sawe yow euer such / The most mayster of te hows weryth no brych’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Dayly in englond meruels be fownd& a mong maryd peple haue such
                    radicacyon…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…þat with ȝowr wyfys ȝow stryfe not to mychlest
                    þe most mayster wer no brych
